About Us

The Word Of Life Bible Institute popularly called WOLBI is one of the educational arms of Salvation Ministries, Home of Success. It is exclusively for the training of men, women, and youths in the Word of God for purposeful living.
The Motto of the Institute, Follow God’s principles and become a principal figure in life, is in line with the pursuit of the visionary mandate given to God’s servant, Pastor David Ibiyeomie to Establish the kingdom of God here on earth.
The Word of Life Bible Institute (WOLBI) commenced the Foundation Certificate Course on December 8th, 1997 with 23 students for two weeks of intensive study in 8 different subjects under the exquisite leadership of Peace Ibiyeomie as the Provost of the Institute.
The Foundation Certificate Course was later renamed to Basic Certificate Course.
The Advanced Certificate course was introduced in June 2004 with 40 start-up students and subsequently in March 2005, the Diploma Certificate Course was also introduced with 35 start-up students.
The Institute, like the Biblical mustard seed, has blossomed into an establishment of reckoning. The Basic Certificate Course now runs ten times in a year from February to November, a remarkable improvement from the two times it originally started with.

LEADERSHIP

WOLBI is headed by a Provost, who reports directly to the Presiding Pastor, David Ibiyeomie. Other Principal figures which includes Senior lecturers and Co-ordinators provides services in ancillary Capacity.
All Correspondences are addressed to the Provost, Word Of Life Bible Institute Plot 17 Birabi Street, GRA Phase1 Port Harcourt, Rivers State, Nigeria.

COURSES

The Word of Life Bible Institute (WOLBI) is a non-denominational institute where the word of God is taught to equip Christians, Leaders, Pastors, Church Workers, Career men and women with the knowledge to handle various issues of life with result.
WOLBI currently run three (3) different programmes:
– Basic Certificate Course
– Advanced Certificate Course
– Diploma Certificate Course[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
